page.title: 14Gargrave, Care of Elderly
page.content: {Neville House}is a home run by the County Council for about 40 elderly people, a few of whom come in for only short periods. {Gargrave House,}formerly the home of the{Coulthurst}family,- who dominated the village with feudal benevolence for many generations,- is now divided into apartments for 17 fairly affluent elderly. {Eshton Hall,}once the seat of the{ {Wilson}family (Sir Matthew was the first M.P. for Skipton) is now a private Nursing Home for about 60 people. The{Craven District Council}has housing with{Warden Service} on the Neville Road Estate. A new{Doctors' Surgery}has recently been built nearby.
